title: Lock admin access to hardcoded Principal ID

requirements.summary: Restore access-denied guard in AdminPanel to display 'Access denied. Admin only.' message for unauthorized callers
acceptanceCriteria: When a non-admin user visits `/admin`, the `getPendingVerifications()` call returns an access-denied error and `AdminPanel.tsx` renders the message 'Access denied. Admin only.' instead of any verifications list.
When the hardcoded admin principal visits `/admin`, the verifications list is rendered normally with no access-denied message.
The `/admin` route does not appear in the main tab navigation bar.

file_operations.description: Add error handling to catch access-denied errors from getPendingVerifications() backend call. When the backend returns an error (trap) indicating unauthorized access, render a centered message displaying 'Access denied. Admin only.' instead of the verifications list. Maintain the existing immediate fetch on mount and approve controls for authorized admins. The component should gracefully handle the authorization trap from the backend and present a clear denial screen to non-admin users.
